pkgmetadata.longdescription: Downloading and Processing Microdata from ECH-INE (Uruguay) // A consistent tool for downloading ECH data, processing them and generating new indicators: poverty, education, employment, etc. All data are downloaded from the official site of the National Institute of Statistics at https://www.gub.uy/instituto- nacional-estadistica/datos-y-estadisticas/encuestas/encuesta- continua-hogares.
